parameters.name: HostGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the host group to query. The name can be up to 128 characters in length. Only exact match is supported.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the bastion host whose user you want to query.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the bastion host ID.

parameters.name: Mode
parameters.description:
The category of the host groups to query. Valid values:

*   **Authorized** (default): queries the host groups that the user is authorized to manage.
*   **Unauthorized**: queries the host groups that the user is not authorized to manage.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.\
Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 20. If you leave this parameter empty, 20 entries are returned on each page.

>  We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host whose user you want to query.

>  For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description:
The user ID.

>  You can call the [ListUsers](~~204522~~) operation to query the user ID.
